Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Sends email to the user with specified inputs and subject body
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_EMAIL_COMMSERVER

children.displayName: Provide email id for sending reports
children.name: INP_EMAIL_ID

Activity.description: Sends an email to a list of users
Activity.name: Email

inputs.val:
<inputs><email class="workflow.types.Email"><from class="java.lang.String" /><to class="java.lang.String">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</to><cc class="java.lang.String" /><bcc class="java.lang.String" /><subject class="java.lang.String">Automation : SendWorkflowEmailsViaCommserver additional setting validation</subject><attachments class="java.lang.Object" /><repeatInterval class="java.lang.Integer" /><body class="java.lang.String"><p>
      <b>Executed on Commserve: </b>xpath:{/workflow/system/commCellName}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>Workflow Engine: </b>xpath:{/workflow/system/workflowEngine/clientName}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>Workflow Name:</b> xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>Executor: </b>xpath:{/workflow/system/executor/userName}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>JobID:</b> xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}
    </p></body><html class="java.lang.Boolean">true</html><replyTo class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></email></inputs>
